page.title: 10Food
page.content: Our group did a survey of food. The top 3 foods were chips with 54, curry with 8 and sausages with 7. If you would like to know how to make chips you get a few potatoes and peel them. When you have peeled them you have to cut them into straight lines and then you put them into the fat which should be hot because you have already put the fat on to the oven. I think that we are very lucky in this country because we have a lot of choice. In our survey (of 152 children) there were 62 different favourite foods. Curry was brought over to us by Indian immigrants in the last 30 years. Our grandparents would not have tried it but people in this country have gradually got used to it and now it is quite popular as shown by our survey.
